ghost

Class GameObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • ghost.GameObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Fruit, Movable, Wall

    public abstract class GameObject
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class which is the superclass that all objects in the game extend from. All game objects have a pixel coordinate, a grid coordinate, a sprite and a game manager. They also must have a draw function to be drawn on the screen, and a tick function to process logic.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Returns the x grid coordinate of the game object.
      int getGridY()
      Returns the y grid coordinate of the game object.

      Returns the sprite of the game object.

      Sets the x coordinate of the game object.
      void setY(int y)
      Sets the y coordinate of the game object.
      abstract void tick()
      Abstract method which forces each subclass to be able to perform logic for each game frame.
